explains: n. 发生的事，事件；发生，出现（尤指意外且令人不快的事）
wordGroup: probability of occurrence 发生概率；事件概率

sentences.en: Vandalism used to be a rare occurrence here.
sentences.cn: 过去这里很少发生故意破坏公物的事。

sentences.en: Complaints seemed to be an everyday occurrence.
sentences.cn: 投诉似乎成了天天发生的事。

sentences.en: One of them is a word counter, which counts for certain word occurrence in several files.
sentences.cn: 其中之一是单词计数器，它统计某一单词在几个文件中出现的次数。
